name: Spades Blitz - Real Rewards
description:
Play free Spades Blitz - win REAL CASH while playing spades online card game! Compete against players from around the world in head-to-head tournaments and win real rewards! Available in Solo and Pairs modes.

Master the spades card game by bidding nil or blind nil, learn how to break spades, and hone your spades strategy. Compete to win real-world prizes! Play uninterruptedly without ads!


SPADES BLITZ FEATURES

• SOLO & PAIRS modes - The end score of each player is compared with other gamers around the world and you compete to win real prizes.
• Practise against advanced AI players.
• Classic Spades online game.
• Earn bonus “Z” chips every few hours. Claim your free chips and play spades free!
• Head-to-Head tournaments - Players with the same score will solve the same deck, and the player who finishes with the most points wins. Both players get the same boards, turns, and time limits.
• Login bonus - Collect bonus chips every day!
• Tutorial - Go through our simple and clear tutorials to help you get the rules of spades fast
• Ad-free - Play uninterrupted the free spades game.
• Take turns fast for the highest score.
• Compete in real cash tournaments!
• Watch a video, earn extra Z chips!
• Master skill games! Practise spades free and earn tickets to win real-world prizes.
• Trophies - Coverall 63 achievements and become the “King of SkillZ”.
• Fair gameplay with the Skillz Random Number Generator Integration.
• SkillZ rewards - Play, collect tickets and get real-world prizes.

Get physical rewards while playing the classic spades card game!

Win trophies, enter the 1V1 tournament and compete against other players like you!

*IMPORTANT*:

Prize tournaments are not available in the following states: AZ, AR, CT, DE, IN, LA, ME, MT, SC, SD, and TN. If you don't live in a real prize-enabled region, you can still play for fun with our virtual currency.
